title: House of Cards Season 2: Slate's Spoiler Special
description:
Slate's David Haglund, June Thomas and Willa Paskin discuss the second season of Netflix's House of Cards.  WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've seen the show.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
